title: What is a way that technology is affecting the hospitality industry? - Quora

response.answer_text: In my experience, I haven't seen much change. However, in some fast food restaurants (McDonalds, Burger King etc) you can order your food on a digital kiosk. I believe that's the only main difference in how things used to be. Real people still cook your food, serve it to you, and clean your dishes after you are done. :)
